reasoning: Anaplastic thyroid carcinoma represents 1-2% of all thyroid cancers. With thyroid cancer incidence ~6-8 per 100k globally in 2005, anaplastic subtype incidence ~0.15 per 100k person-years from cancer registry data.
source: Kebebew E et al. (2005). Anaplastic thyroid carcinoma. Treatment outcome and prognostic factors. Cancer. 103(7):1330-1335
